Smart Grids.Description: Smart grids enable the integration of renewable energy sources into the electricity grid, allowing for a more sustainable and efficient energy system.
Smart grids optimize the use of energy storage systems, enabling better management of energy supply and demand, and facilitating the integration of intermittent renewable energy sources.
Smart grids support the charging infrastructure for electric vehicles, enabling efficient and coordinated charging to minimize grid stress and maximize renewable energy utilization.
Smart grids utilize smart meters to monitor and manage energy consumption in real-time, enabling demand response programs and promoting energy efficiency.
